== What is Gnome Translate ==
<nowiki>[[http://www.nongnu.org/libtranslate/gnome-translate/|Gnome Translate]]</nowiki> is a GNOME interface to <nowiki>[[http://www.nongnu.org/libtranslate/|libtranslate]]</nowiki>. It can translate a text or web page between several natural languages, and it can automatically detect the source language as you type.

== How to install ==

Install the <nowiki>[[apt:gnome-translate|gnome-translate]]</nowiki> package from the Universe repository.
